creator: Joompa Joompa
descriptionHtml:
JoompaJoompa is more than just an App for booking or searching for online services, It is an App that has all your service needs covered and lets you choose from an extensive list of service providers from the comfort of your home and the ability to meet your service consultant face to face via video or voice calls and chat with them and it's FREE for you.
Whether you need tuition for your kids, a plumber for your plumbing, someone to teach you how to make nasi lemak, a person to drive you about, a person to teach you handicraft or someone to assist you for your legal needs, Any service, any time, any where, Find it all on Joompajoompa.
The best part is you can have a video call with your service provider, so you put a name to face for that added security feature for you or if you need to meet your consultants, You know him by face to make it easier.
You select the services you need, have a video or voice call with the consultant you selected, agree on your service requirement, receive your service, and make payments, It’s that simple.
A one-stop-app for all your (Tuition, Legal, Fitness, Plumbing, Cooking, Financial, Accounting and much more) needs without leaving the comfort of your home.
Register via the App or Website
Select the service consultant you require
Agree on what you service needs are and the payment terms
Make payments and receive your service.

You may ask questions or consult your service providers for free depending on the service providers terms and condition.
We are on track to have as many service providers for you from all over Malaysia, We’re covering from Perlis up north, Johor down south and across the sea to Sabah & Sarawak.
Want to learn how to make Laksa Sarawak, you may just find a service provider who can teach you the recipe via a video call or you may want to hire a wedding planner for your wedding, Have a video call and tell them how you want it to be. Anything and everything is available on Joompajoompa.com

🔅Find the verified service consultants nearest to your location; view reviews, book appointments

🔅Consult or Video Chat online from anywhere

🔅Chat privately and securely with service consultants

Tired of searching for the right service providers or you’re not sure if the person you choose is the right person because you’re not having a face to face meeting or you’re looking for a niche service and you’re not able to find it, Well, Joompajoompa offers an expansive list of service providers and you get to speak to them face to face via a quick Video call, we’re targeting up to 10,000 service providers all over Malaysia to assist you within the first 3 months, Whether you’re up north in Kedah, Perlis or down south in Johor or across the sea in Sabah/Sarawak, you can engage, meet face to face and speak to a consultant anywhere in Malaysia using Joompajoompa.

Find (Tuition, Legal, Fitness, Financial, Accounting, Cooking and much more) service consultants in your area by name, service provided and rates.

Enjoy hassle-free online appointment booking

Online consultations - No waiting in queues, No driving out, No searching online, no putting face mask & No rushing for appointments.

What about the fees for the services rendered by our consultants ? well since you’re talking to them face to face, you can negotiate with your service consultants, It’s even better to negotiate when you’re talking to them face to face via our Video call function.
You want them to show you the product they are selling ? Well ask them on the Video call, there is nothing like looking at the product in real before deciding 😊

We’re also planning other features for JoompaJoompa, given time it will be an experience like no other for your online service needs.
"
descriptionShort: Generate a consistent income by marketing your skills for a fee to customer.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Now find online experts with one click, for instant consultation.
Minor bug fixes and enhancements
